content.rendered:
ScoreSafe

The Ultimate Combat Sport Event Management Solution

Introducing ScoreSafe By BoxSafe

A powerful and comprehensive boxing event management software designed for seamless, real-time synchronisation of scoring, fight management, and event reporting. ScoreSafe revolutionises how boxing events are managed, providing organisers, officials, and trainers with a dynamic, user-friendly interface

Key Features of ScoreSafe

Get Results As They Happen

ScoreSafe enables judges to submit scores for each round in real time, allowing all relevant officials (referees, judges, event admins) to see updates instantly. The system calculates scores, including point deductions, and provides immediate results for each bout – whether it’s a unanimous decision, or even draw

Create And Manage Events Effortlessly

From assigning officials to setting fight details like bout numbers, weight categories, and number of rounds, ScoreSafe automates the process. Event admins have complete control to add, edit, or remove fights, while the entire event is track for real-time monitoring.

Clear And Effective Control Over a Bout

In case of injuries or other stoppages, ScoreSafe ensures accuracy by pausing the timer and logging the reason for the stoppage. Doctors are notified immediately to assess the situation and approve or deny the continuation of the fight, with all decisions synchronised across devices.

All Bout Details Accessible For Review

After each fight, ScoreSafe generates detailed post-fight reports, including scorecards, stoppages, round times, and judges’ comments. These reports can exported in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, JSON), providing transparency for event admins and stakeholders.

Making The Check Up Quicker

ScoreSafe integrates doctor approval workflows and allows referees to manage the timing of fights, track stoppages, and submit final fight results. All actions are synchronised, ensuring no discrepancies between fight time and stoppage events.

Accessible On The Go

ScoreSafe is built with a mobile-first approach, making it accessible from any device, including smartpones, tablets, and desktops. This makes it ideal for fast-paced events where officials need quick access to scoring and fight updates.

Keeping Boxing Safe Digitally

With security as a top priority, ScoreSafe ensures that sensitive information remains confidential until after the fight concludes. All submissions are securely logged, and the system supports offline mode for uninterrupted scoring and data synchronisation when connectivity is restored.

Who Can Benefit From ScoreSafe?

Event Organisers

Manage your events from start to finish with ease, knowing that all details, from fight to creation, to result submission are handled seamlessly.

Judges & Officials

Use ScoreSafe to submit scores and manage fight-related data in real time, ensuring the accuracy and transparency of results

Doctors

Make informed decisions about fighter safety with integrated stoppage notifications and easy access to fighter health details.

Trainers & Fighters

Get instant access to fight results, round-by-round breakdowns, and performance analytics.

Inquiries And Hiring ScoreSafe 

Interested in using ScoreSafe for your next event? Reach out to us at inquire@boxsafe.com.au to learn more about how ScoreSafe can streamline your boxing events. Whether you’re organising a local amateur fight or an international tournament, ScoreSafe offers the tools you need to ensure professional and efficient event management.
